scripts.build:dev: hugo mod vendor && dotenv -e ../.env  -- hugo --environment development
scripts.build:audit: HUGO_MINIFY_TDEWOLFF_HTML_KEEPCOMMENTS=true HUGO_ENABLEMISSINGTRANSLATIONPLACEHOLDERS=true hugo mod vendor && dotenv -e ../.env  -- hugo --environment production && grep -inorE '<\!-- raw HTML omitted -->|ZgotmplZ|\[i18n\]|\(<nil>\)|(<nil>)|hahahugo' public/
